projectGridLines.title: Enhancing Journaling with Generative AI and Real-Time Translation
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project focuses on improving the Evolve journaling experience for users through generative AI and real-time language translation. The intern will explore techniques like text suggestion, sentiment analysis, and mood-based prompts to personalize journaling entries. They'll also integrate real-time translation for a global user base.

Skill sets learning: Python, GenAI models, NLP libraries(spaCy, NLTK),  translation APIs (Google Translate), React Native

Expected learning: Gain hands-on experience with generative AI, NLP for sentiment analysis and text suggestion, and API integration.

projectGridLines.title: Build an end-to-end web platform for Evolve
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Evolve currently exists as a mobile app that is awarded by Google and Apple. The intern will build an end to end experience of the app on a website for mobile and desktop. This will involve a lot of understanding of back-end APIs, front end development and design. 

Skill set learning: Front-end frameworks (React, Angular), web development best practices, UI/UX design principles.

Expected learning: Gain experience with full-stack development, API integration, responsive web design, and UI/UX principles.

projectGridLines.title: Conversational Analytics with Generative AI
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project leverages generative AI for conversational analytics on Evolve's vast qualitative data. The intern will build an internal tool using NLP to extract consumer insights for content, marketing, and product roadmap development. 

Skill sets: Python, NLP libraries (spaCy, NLTK), data analysis tools (Pandas, Tableau), generative AI models.

Expected learning: Gain experience with NLP for text analysis and topic modeling, data visualization techniques, and building internal tools.

projectGridLines.title: Product Data & Marketing Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project focuses on analyzing the impact of product changes on Evolve. The intern will use SQL and other tools to track user behavior, measure engagement, and identify areas for improvement. These insights will play a key role in changing the product over the next 6 months.

Skill sets: SQL, data analysis tools (Pandas, Tableau), data visualization, A/B testing methodologies.
